description.title: HoverTranslate
description.subtitle: Build vocabulary while watching YouTube!
description.thank-you: Thank you for choosing my extension!

tips.title: Quick Tips
tips.multipleSelection: Translate phrases: Hold Shift or enable multiple selection in Settings
tips.saveToDictionary: Click on words to save them to your personal dictionary
tips.exportDictionary: Export your vocabulary from Dictionary tab as JSON or CSV
